title: Coaches Help Released Inmates Step From The Cell Into A Job
teaser: U.S. Attorney General Eric Holder and Labor Secretary Tom Perez are traveling to Montgomery County, Md., to highlight workforce training for inmates about to leave prisons and jails. They plan to replicate the county's program around the U.S. by giving federal grant money.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
